extract

public static int extract(peersim.core.Node[] message,
                          int degree,
                          peersim.core.Node[] cache,
                          int csize,
                          peersim.core.Node rnode,
                          java.util.Comparator idc)
XXX Documentation to be improved

Parameters:
message - the buffer where extracted nodes are inserted
degree - the number of nodes (on the left and on the right) that must be extracted
cache - the cache array from where nodes are extracted
csize - cache size (can be smaller than cache.length)
rnode - node with which we are doing an exchange
idc - the comparator used to search and sort ordered set of nodes.
